title: One Killed, Two Hurt in South LA Shooting
content:
One person was killed and two others badly hurt Wednesday in a shooting in South Los Angeles Wednesday.
The incident, which is suspected to stem from a family dispute, was reported at 7:18 p.m. at 81st Street and Western Avenue, Los Angeles Police Department said. Witnesses heard several gunshots and people screaming.
One victim was killed in the shooting, while one was critical and another in a serious condition at hospital.
